_header: At the beginning of the meat
_description: A Boar’s Head carol — three quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Po po po po / Loue brane and so do mo’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
At þe be gynyng of þe meteOf a borys hed ȝe schal
                    hete…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Hey ȝow fast þat ȝe had don& ȝe xal
                    syngyn or ye gon
